alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Grundy; Van Buren; Warren (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 1:10PM CDT until August 12 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Van Buren County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Warren County in Middle Tennessee... Southern Coffee County in Middle Tennessee... Grundy County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 109 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from McMinnville to near Tullahoma, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manchester, Tullahoma, Gruetli-Laager, Tracy City, Monteagle, Altamont, Coalmont, Palmer, Beersheba Springs, Viola, Hillsboro, Pelham, Arnold AFB and Fiery Gizzard State Park. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 113 and 135. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
